definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_log_in</field><next><block type="file_variable"><field name="var">dosya</field><field name="isDirectory">FALSE</field><field name="createFile">FALSE</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">re.json</field></block></value><value name="location"><block type="get_game_directory"></block></value><next><block type="read_json"><field name="var">dosya</field><field name="jVar">re</field><statement name="values"><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:timer_default</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_from_text"><value name="NUMTEXT"><block type="get_json_text"><field name="vars">re</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">timer</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:event_second</field><value name="VAL"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:timer_default</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
